default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Hmph. Finally found me. It's fine. As long as the guitar is still here, anywhere will do.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Yes, that's it! Quick, give me a paper and pen! A new tune came to me, I need to jot it down!

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I can wow the audience even with a harp.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Go, Krist.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Done!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: What a **** performance!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Solo time!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Can't even... get into... a 27-year-old club... hahaha...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Good timing. Let me hear your demo.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: As long as I'm still alive, those records companies can fuck off. No way in hell would I let them steal Anavrin's songs.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: My favorite food? Coffee with milk, and strawberry cake... what did you expect? You thought I could live on alcohol alone?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: My dad always used to say that God blessed me with musical talent so I wouldn't take the wrong path... Haha, pity I don't believe in God, nor did I choose the right path.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Back then, our lead singer would always holler about burning this city to ashes. Ironically, he became the first of the bunch to burn to ashes.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Maybe because it happened so long ago, but I don't hate her so much anymore. As long as she stops plotting against Anavrin, she can do whatever she wants. I won't stop her anymore.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: When this is all over... If that day comes, I want to keep on performing. Of course, I'll leave you a front row seat. Don't you dare not show up.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: In the past few years, all I had was this guitar. Now... I don't want to sound corny, but thank you for being by my side.

default.title: Idle
default.text: But I'm a creep, I'm a weirdo. What the hell am I doing here? I don't belong here.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Get lost!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Of course I care about the audience, but don't wag your finger at me and bullshit before the song is even finished. Got it?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Perfect! I can meet some old friends on the way.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Come as you are, as you were, as I want you to be.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: New riff, not bad.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: Bass drummer get ready! The performance is about to start.

backstage_break.title: Obtain Attire
backstage_break.text: Why are you following me backstage? Ugh, no need to worry about me.

backstage_break.title: Greeting
backstage_break.text: Find yourself a seat, but just a heads-up—I broke a chair in a fight here and can't remember which one.

backstage_break.title: Ordinary Contact 1
backstage_break.text:
It's dark, cramped, and cluttered backstage, with music loud enough to deafen.
But here, I feel alive.

backstage_break.title: Ordinary Contact 2
backstage_break.text: Thanks for the bouquet, Chief. Send me a bigger one when I go on a world tour someday.

backstage_break.title: Idle
backstage_break.text: It's nice to have someone to talk to during breaks.

backstage_break.title: Annoyed
backstage_break.text: Heck, I don't have to dress as boring as you to go on stage.

backstage_break.title: Special Attention
backstage_break.text: Nice view from here, huh? You get to take in the whole stage—and me.
